price: او وايه چې حق راغى او باطل له منځه ولاړ، يقيناً باطل له منځه تلونكى دى.
arabic: وَقُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ كَانَ زَهُوقٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waqul jāa al-ḥaqu wazahaqa al-bāṭilu inna al-bāṭila kāna zahūqan
